mapper.update: UPDATE stair_shaped_board SET hits=hits+1 WHERE no=#{no}
mapper.select: SELECT grpno FROM stair_shaped_board WHERE no=#{prntno}
mapper.update: UPDATE stair_shaped_board SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, hits=hits-1 WHERE no=#{no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT no, LEAD(no,1,'-1') OVER (ORDER BY rnum) downno, LAG(no,1,'-1') OVER (ORDER BY rnum) upno FROM ( SELECT rownum as rnum, no FROM stair_shaped_board START WITH prntno IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR no=prntno ORDER SIBLINGS BY grpno desc ) ssb ) WHERE no=#{no}
